title: Rapier Proficiency
content:
Rapier Proficiency Effect Add your Proficiency Bonus to Attack Rolls with Rapiers. Requirements Bard Lvl 1 Rogue Lvl 1 Drow

Rapier Proficiency

Add your Proficiency Bonus to Attack Rolls with Rapiers.

Bard Lvl 1 Rogue Lvl 1 Drow

Rapier Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.

Rapier Proficiency Information

Add your Proficiency Bonus to Attack Rolls with Rapiers.
